TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaSet extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述的快取。

span.span: Contains a cache of XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 請勿從未知或未受信任的來源或位置的結構描述。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 如此一來，將危害您的程式碼的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 結構描述 （包括內嵌結構描述） 是本質上容易遭到阻絕服務攻擊。不接受其在受信任的案例。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 結構描述驗證錯誤訊息和例外狀況可能會公開機密資訊的內容模型或結構描述檔案的 URI 路徑。Schema validation error messages and exceptions may expose sensitive information about the content model or URI paths to the schema file. 請小心不要公開給未受信任的呼叫端的這項資訊。Be careful not to expose this information to untrusted callers. > - < 安全性考量 > 章節將討論其他安全性考量。Additional security considerations are covered in the "Security Considerations" section. 快取或文件庫，您可以在其中儲存的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述。 is a cache or library where you can store XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas. 會藉由在記憶體中快取結構描述，而不是從檔案或 URL 來存取它們，來增加效能。 improves performance by caching schemas in memory instead of accessing them from a file or a URL. 每個結構描述由命名空間 URI 和結構描述加入至集時指定的位置。Each schema is identified by the namespace URI and location that was specified when the schema was added to the set. 您使用要指派內容物件應該使用 XML 讀取器，來驗證資料。You use the property to assign the object an XML reader should use for data validation. ## 安全性考量Security Considerations - 請勿使用來源不明或不受信任來源的結構描述。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources. 如此一來，將危害您的程式碼的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. 外部命名空間或參考中的位置包含，匯入和重新定義結構描述的項目會解析與基底 URI 包含或匯入它們之結構描述。External namespaces or locations referenced in include, import, and redefine elements of a schema are resolved with respect to the base URI of the schema that includes or imports them. 例如，如果包含或匯入結構描述的基底 URI 是空的或`null`，外部位置都相對於目前目錄中已解決。For example, if the base URI of the including or importing schema is empty or `null`, the external locations are resolved with respect to the current directory. 類別預設用來解析外部結構描述。The class is used to resolve external schemas by default. 若要停用的 include，匯入、 解析度和重新定義結構描述的元素，設定屬性`null`。To disable resolution of include, import, and redefine elements of a schema, set the property to `null`. - 類別會使用類別來剖析，並比對規則運算式中的 XML 結構描述。The class uses the class to parse and match regular expressions in an XML schema. XML 結構描述中使用規則運算式模式 facet 的驗證可能會增加的 CPU 使用量，應避免在高可用性案例。Validation of pattern facets with regular expressions in an XML schema may involve increased CPU usage and should be avoided in high availability scenarios. - 使用所引發的例外狀況類別，例如類別可能包含不應該公開受信任的案例中的機密資訊。Exceptions raised as a result of using the class, such as the class may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 例如，屬性回到造成例外狀況的結構描述檔案的 URI 路徑。For example, the property of an returns the URI path to the schema file that caused the exception. 屬性不應該公開受信任的案例中。The property should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 使機密資訊不會出現在受信任的案例，就應該正確地處理例外狀況。Exceptions should be properly handled so that this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios. ## Examples 下列範例會使用儲存在 中的結構描述，來驗證 XML 檔案。The following example validates an XML file using schemas stored in the . XML 檔案中的命名空間 (`urn:bookstore-schema`)，會識別 中用於驗證的結構描述。The namespace in the XML file, `urn:bookstore-schema`, identifies which schema in the to use for validation. [!code-cpp[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/CPP/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/CS/validschemaset.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/VB/validschemaset.vb#1)] ## 輸入Input 範例會使用下列兩個輸入檔案。The sample uses the following two input files. **booksSchemaFail.xml:****booksSchemaFail.xml:** [!code-xml[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/XML/booksschemafail.xml#2)] **books.xsd:****books.xsd:** [!code-xml[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/XML/books.xsd#3)] ## 輸出Output 驗證錯誤：命名空間 urn:bookstore-schema 中的項目 book 在 urn:bookstore-schema 命名空間中具有無效的項目子系 author。Validation Error: The element 'book' in namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema' has invalid child element 'author' in namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema'. 命名空間 urn:bookstore-schema 中預期的是 title。Expected 'title' in namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema'. 驗證錯誤：命名空間 urn:bookstore-schema 中的項目 author 在 urn:bookstore-schema 命名空間中具有無效的項目子系 'name'。Validation Error: The element 'author' in namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema' has invalid child element 'name' in namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema'. 命名空間 urn:bookstore-schema 中預期的是 first-name。Expected 'first-name' in namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema'.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果物件已經存在於、方法不會執行任何動作。If the object already exists in the , the method does nothing. 這個方法的功能等同於的方法。The functionality of this method is identical to that of the method.

summary.span: 將指定 中的所有 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述加入 。

span.span: Adds all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the given to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構描述可以加入至之前，它必須成功地前置處理。Before a schema can be added to an , it has to be successfully preprocessed. 前置處理，就會執行下列基本工作。Preprocessing performs the following basic tasks. 1. 結構的有效性，根據 W3C XML 結構描述，規則會檢查結構描述，但未完全驗證的結構描述。The schema is checked for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema, but the schema is not fully validated. 2. 內部和外部結構描述元件的參考會解析。References to internal and external schema components are resolved. 已成功擷取任何匯入或包含結構描述也會新增至。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 匯入結構描述會新增為個別物件和包含的結構描述進行的一部分包括。Imported schemas are added as separate objects, and included schemas are made a part of the including . 如果屬性新增`true`中的所有結構描述將會加入至。If the property of the to add is `true`, all schemas in the to add are added to the . 如果屬性新增`false`，加入每個結構描述之前所加入前置處理過。If the property of the to add is `false`, each schema added is preprocessed before being added. 如果在新加入的結構描述前置處理，就無法加入的結構描述; 相反地，就會擲回。If any of the schemas in the newly added fails to be preprocessed, no schemas are added; instead, an is thrown. 因此，下列兩個程式碼範例並不相同。As a result, the following two code example are not equivalent. ```vb ' First example schemaSet.Add(schemaSet1) ' Second example Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema in schemaSet.Schemas() schemaSet.Add(schema) Next ``` ```csharp // First example schemaSet.Add(schemaSet1); // Second example foreach(XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas()) { schemaSet.Add(schema); } ``` 先前的兩個程式碼範例並不相同。The previous two code examples are not equivalent. 在第一個範例中，如果無效的結構描述存在於`schemaSet1`及其屬性設定為`false`，結構描述會加入至`schemaSet`。In the first example, if an invalid schema exists in `schemaSet1` and its property is set to `false`, no schemas are added to `schemaSet`. 在第二個範例中，結構描述數目可以加入至`schemaSet`遇到無效的結構描述，並擲回例外狀況之前。In the second example, a number of schemas can be added to `schemaSet` before an invalid schema is encountered and an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何將結構描述新增至，然後再新增至新使用方法。The following code example illustrates adding schemas to an , then adding the to a new using the method. ```vb Dim schemaSet1 As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/retail", "http://www.contoso.com/retail.xsd") schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/music", "http://www.contoso.com/music.xsd") Dim schemaSet2 As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet schemaSet2.Add(schemaSet1) ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet1 = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/retail", "http://www.contoso.com/retail.xsd"); schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/music", "http://www.contoso.com/music.xsd"); XmlSchemaSet schemaSet2 = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet2.Add(schemaSet1); ```

span.span: An object if the schema is valid.

span.span: If the schema is not valid and a is specified, then is returned and the appropriate validation event is raised.

returns.span: 否則會擲回 。

span.span: Otherwise, an is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構描述可以加入至之前，它必須成功地前置處理。Before a schema can be added to an , it has to be successfully preprocessed. 前置處理，就會執行下列基本工作。Preprocessing performs the following basic tasks. 1. 結構的有效性，根據 W3C XML 結構描述，規則會檢查結構描述，但未完全驗證的結構描述。The schema is checked for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema, but the schema is not fully validated. 2. 內部和外部結構描述元件的參考會解析。References to internal and external schema components are resolved. 已成功擷取任何匯入或包含結構描述也會新增至。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 匯入結構描述會新增為個別物件和包含的結構描述進行的一部分包括。Imported schemas are added as separate objects, and included schemas are made a part of the including . 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 新增至結構描述具有相同已經包含在結構描述目標命名空間和結構描述位置 URL會傳回原始的結構描述物件。Adding a schema to the with the same target namespace and schema location URL as a schema already contained within the will return the original schema object. - 當新的結構描述已成功新增到、屬性設`false`。When a new schema is successfully added to an , the property of the is set to `false`. - 發生 XML 結構描述中任何包含或匯入項目都已解決時方法呼叫。Any include or import elements encountered in an XML schema are resolved when the method is called. 無法解析包含和匯入項目產生結構描述驗證警告，如果沒有已指定為物件，這些警告將不會報告。Failure to resolve include and import elements results in a schema validation warning and if no has been specified for the object, these warning will not be reported. - 如果具有相同的目標命名空間中已經有結構描述的結構描述加入至，新增這兩個結構描述。If a schema with the same target namespace as a schema that already exists in the is added to the , both schemas are added. > [!NOTE] > 此行為不同於過時物件。This behavior differs from the obsolete object. - 方法已使用的目標命名空間的結構描述中定義，而不是需要做為參數指定的目標命名空間的能力時方法呼叫。The method of the has the ability to use the target namespace defined in a schema, rather than requiring the target namespace be specified as a parameter when the method is called. 指定`null`中`targetNamespace`參數方法指示来使用的結構描述中定義的目標命名空間，如下列程式碼範例所示。Specifying `null` in the `targetNamespace` parameter of the method instructs the to use the target namespace defined in the schema, as illustrated in the following code example. ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add(Nothing, "books.xsd") Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema In schemaSet.Schemas("http://www.contoso.com/books") schema.Write(Console.Out) Next ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add(null, "books.xsd"); foreach(XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas("http://www.contoso.com/books")) { schema.Write(Console.Out); } ``` 在上述程式碼範例`null`指定為`targetNamespace`參數方法。In the code example above, `null` is specified as the `targetNamespace` parameter to the method. 如此一來，`targetNamespace`定義 books.xml 中使用檔案。As a result, the `targetNamespace` defined in the books.xml file is used. 在此情況下，呼叫方法就會相同如果http://www.contoso.com/books如同已指定為`targetNamespace`參數。In this case, the result of calling the method would be identical if http://www.contoso.com/books had been specified as the `targetNamespace` parameter. - W3C XML 結構描述可讓沒有目標命名空間包含結構描述中定義的目標命名空間與結構描述。W3C XML Schema allows schemas without a target namespace to be included in schemas with a target namespace defined. 在此情況下，結構描述中定義的目標命名空間會強制轉型為包含結構描述的目標命名空間。In this case, the schema without a target namespace defined is coerced into the target namespace of the including schema. 包含結構描述會被視為已定義目標命名空間。The included schema is treated as if it had that target namespace defined. 同樣地，結構描述沒有目標命名空間可以加入和強制型轉到所指定的目標命名空間方法，如下列範例所示。Similarly, schemas without a target namespace can be added to the and coerced into the target namespace specified by the method, as illustrated in the following example. ``` ``` 如果上述的結構描述加入至具目標命名空間http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace（如下所示在下列程式碼中），它會被視為結構描述中宣告的目標命名空間已`http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace`。If the schema above is added to the with the target namespace http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace (as shown in the code below), it is treated as if the target namespace declared in the schema was `http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace`. ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace", "http://www.contoso.com/targetnamespace.xsd") Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema in schemaSet.Schemas() Console.WriteLine(schema.TargetNamespace) Next ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace", "http://www.contoso.com/targetnamespace.xsd"); foreach(XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas()) { Console.WriteLine(schema.TargetNamespace); } ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd結構描述目標命名空間為http://www.contoso.com/books至。The following code example adds the http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd schema with a target namespace of http://www.contoso.com/books to the . ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); ``` 該範例使用 `books.xsd` 檔案做為輸入。The example uses the `books.xsd` file as input. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/XML/books.xsd#3)]

span.span: Otherwise, an is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構描述可以加入至之前，它必須成功地前置處理。Before a schema can be added to an , it has to be successfully preprocessed. 前置處理，就會執行下列基本工作。Preprocessing performs the following basic tasks. 1. 結構的有效性，根據 W3C XML 結構描述，規則會檢查結構描述，但未完全驗證的結構描述。The schema is checked for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema, but the schema is not fully validated. 2. 內部和外部結構描述元件的參考會解析。References to internal and external schema components are resolved. 已成功擷取任何匯入或包含結構描述也會新增至。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 匯入結構描述會新增為個別物件和包含的結構描述進行的一部分包括。Imported schemas are added as separate objects, and included schemas are made a part of the including . 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 已成功擷取結構描述匯入或中包含的結構描述包含也會新增至。Successfully retrieved schemas imported or included by the schemas contained in the are also added to the . - 如果並非位於根項目除非目前的項目是項目就會擲回。If the is not positioned on the root element, an is thrown unless the current item is an element. 如果目前的項目`xs:schema`項目，結構描述文件讀入，否則因為無效的結構描述會擲回。If the current item is an `xs:schema` element, the schema document is read into the ; otherwise, an is thrown because the schema is not valid. - 如果位於 XML 節點的序列，透過新增的第一個節點的順序。If the is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, only the first node in the sequence is added. - 如果結構描述從建立方法呼叫、 值屬性會被忽略，因為內嵌結構描述處理不會套用為 W3C XML 結構描述文件。If the schema was created from a method call, the value of the property is ignored, because inline schema processing is not applied for W3C XML Schema documents. - 屬性不會用來解析命名空間或結構描述中的位置參考包含和匯入項目。The property of the is not used to resolve references to namespaces or schema locations in include and import elements. 相反地，屬性用。Instead, the property of the is used. - 方法已使用的目標命名空間的結構描述中定義，而不是需要做為參數指定的目標命名空間的能力時方法呼叫。The method of the has the ability to use the target namespace defined in a schema, rather than requiring the target namespace be specified as a parameter when the method is called. 指定`null`或至方法指示使用結構描述中定義的目標命名空間。Specifying `null` or to the method instructs the to use the target namespace defined in the schema. 如需這個行為的範例，請參閱方法。For an example of this behavior, see the method. 這個方法的其餘的功能等同於的方法。The remaining functionality of this method is identical to that of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將 books.xsd 結構描述中包含目標命名空間為http://www.contoso.com/books至。The following code example adds the books.xsd schema contained in the with a target namespace of http://www.contoso.com/books to the . ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", New XmlTextReader("books.xsd") ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", new XmlTextReader("books.xsd"); ```

span.span: The schema is not valid.

exception.span: 做為參數傳遞的 物件為 。

span.span: The object passed as a parameter is .

summary.span: 取得或設定 的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the for the .
The for the .

value.span: 預設為將 屬性設為 的 執行個體。

span.span: The default is an instance with the property set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會指定唯一物件屬性 (UPA) 的驗證選項。The class specifies Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) validation options for the . 如需啟用 UPA 驗證檢查的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about enabling UPA validation checks, see the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Compile() cil managed

summary.span: 將加入至 的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述，編譯為一個邏輯結構描述。

span.span: Compiles the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas added to the into one logical schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證會在需要時自動呼叫這個方法和不已經先前編譯 — 例如，當做為輸入用來建立物件存放至屬性物件。This method is called automatically when validation is needed and the has not been previously compiled—for example, when an is used as an input to create an object in the property of an object. 如果是已經在已編譯的狀態，這個方法會重新編譯結構描述。If the is already in the compiled state, this method will not recompile the schemas. 如果此方法執行成功，屬性設定為`true`。If this method executes successfully, the property is set to `true`. 先前編譯的結構描述不會重新編譯。Schemas that have been previously compiled by an are not recompiled. 不過，使用編譯的結構描述方法會重新編譯。However, schemas that were compiled using the method of the will be recompiled. > [!NOTE] > 您需要呼叫方法，如果您已變更結構描述 （或其包含/匯入的其中一個） 之後將它加入至。You need to call the method if you have changed a schema (or one of its includes/imports) after adding it to the . 方法會檢查結構描述的結構的有效性，根據 W3C XML 結構描述的規則。The method will check the schema for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema. 不過，它不會執行完整的驗證檢查。However, it will not perform a full validation check. 它也會解析內部和外部結構描述元件的參考。It will also resolve references to internal and external schema components. 已成功擷取任何匯入或包含結構描述也會新增至。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 匯入結構描述會新增為個別物件時包含結構描述進行一部分包括。Imported schemas are added as separate objects while included schemas are made part of the including . 如果成功，請重新處理呼叫屬性設定為 false。If the call to reprocess is successful, the property is set to false. ## Examples ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") schemaSet.Compile() ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); schemaSet.Compile(); ```

exception.span: 錯誤發生於驗證和編譯 中的結構描述時。

span.span: An error occurred when validating and compiling the schemas in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 間接加入至結構描述所偵測到方法; 例如，匯入結構描述。Schemas that are indirectly added to the are detected by the method; for example, imported schemas. 如此一來，如果結構描述http://www.contoso.com/retail用來匯入的結構描述命名空間http://www.contoso.com/books命名空間加入至，則呼叫與`http://www.contoso.com/books`做為參數，它會傳回`true`。As a result, if a schema for the http://www.contoso.com/retail namespace which imports a schema for the http://www.contoso.com/books namespace is added to the , calling with `http://www.contoso.com/books` as a parameter, it returns `true`.

summary.span: 取得 中的邏輯 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述數目。

span.span: Gets the number of logical XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the .

value.span: 中的邏輯結構描述數目。

span.span: The number of logical schemas in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有兩個結構描述命名空間`http://www.contoso.com`中、屬性會傳回 1，因為結構描述會被視為單一邏輯結構描述進行驗證。If there are two schemas for the namespace `http://www.contoso.com` in the , the property would return 1 because the schemas are treated as a single logical schema for validation purposes. 不過，如果命名空間的結構描述`http://www.contoso.com/retail`匯入的結構描述`http://www.contoso.com/books`命名空間中，值屬性將會是 2。However, if a schema for the namespace `http://www.contoso.com/retail` imported a schema for the `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace, the value of the property would be 2.

value.span: 如果上次從 加入或移除結構描述之後，已編譯 中的結構描述，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the schemas in the have been compiled since the last time a schema was added or removed from the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果結構描述是在 時編輯的，則 屬性不受影響。The property is not affected if schemas are edited while in the . 也不會追蹤 中個別結構描述的更新。Updates of the individual schemas in the are not tracked. 因此，即使 中的其中一個結構描述已變更，只要未在 `true` 中加入或移除結構描述， 屬性就可為 。As a result, the property can be `true` even though one of the schemas contained in the has been altered, as long as no schemas were added or removed from the . ## Examples 如需屬性，請參閱方法。For an example of the property, see the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema Reprocess(class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema schema) cil managed
Public Function Reprocess (schema As XmlSchema) As XmlSchema

param.name: schema
param.span: 要重新處理的結構描述。

span.span: The schema to reprocess.

summary.span: 重新處理已存在於 中的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述。

span.span: Reprocesses an XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema that already exists in the .

returns.span: 物件 (如果結構描述是有效的結構描述)。

span.span: An object if the schema is a valid schema.

returns.span: 如果結構描述無效，且指定了 ，則會傳回 ，並會引發適當的驗證事件。

span.span: If the schema is not valid and a is specified, is returned and the appropriate validation event is raised.

returns.span: 否則會擲回 。

span.span: Otherwise, an is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新處理結構描述執行結構描述上執行的所有前置處理步驟時方法呼叫。Reprocessing a schema performs all the preprocessing steps performed on a schema when the method is called. 如果呼叫成功，屬性設定為`false`。If the call to is successful, the property is set to `false`. 重新處理方法應該在之後的結構描述中使用之後已修改執行編譯。The Reprocess method should be used after a schema in the has been modified, after the has performed compilation. > [!NOTE] > 您需要呼叫方法，如果您已變更結構描述 （或其包含/匯入的其中一個） 之後將它加入至。You need to call the method if you have changed a schema (or one of its includes/imports) after adding it to the . 方法會檢查結構描述的結構的有效性，根據 W3C XML 結構描述的規則。The method will check the schema for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema. 不過，它不會執行完整的驗證檢查。However, it will not perform a full validation check. 它也會解析內部和外部結構描述元件的參考。It will also resolve references to internal and external schema components. 已成功擷取任何匯入或包含結構描述也會新增至。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 匯入結構描述會新增為個別物件時包含結構描述進行一部分包括。Imported schemas are added as separate objects while included schemas are made part of the including . 如果成功，請重新處理呼叫屬性設定為 false。If the call to reprocess is successful, the property is set to false. ## Examples 下列範例說明重新處理結構描述加入至。The following example illustrates reprocessing a schema added to the . 之後使用編譯方法，並加入至結構描述已經過修改，屬性將設定為`true`即使中的結構描述、已經過修改。After the is compiled using the method, and the schema added to the is modified, the property will be set to `true`, even though a schema in the has been modified. 呼叫方法會執行的所有前置處理由方法和集合屬性`false`。Calling the method performs all the preprocessing performed by the method and sets the property to `false`. ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() Dim schema As XmlSchema = schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") schemaSet.Compile() Dim element As XmlSchemaElement = New XmlSchemaElement() schema.Items.Add(element) element.Name = "book" element.SchemaTypeName = New XmlQualifiedName("string", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema") schemaSet.Reprocess(schema) ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); XmlSchema schema = schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); schemaSet.Compile(); XmlSchemaElement element = new XmlSchemaElement(); schema.Items.Add(element); element.Name = "book"; element.SchemaTypeName = new XmlQualifiedName("string", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"); schemaSet.Reprocess(schema); ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ICollection Schemas() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回 中所有 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the .

returns.span: 物件，包含已加入至 的所有結構描述。

span.span: An object containing all the schemas that have been added to the .

returns.span: 如果結構描述尚未加入至 ，則會傳回空的 物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回結構描述，已加入間接因為它們已匯入。This method returns schemas that were added indirectly to the because they were imported. > [!NOTE] > 方法相當於方法過時。The method is the equivalent of the method of the obsolete . ## Examples 下列範例說明如何反覆查看中的所有結構描述。The following example illustrates how to iterate over all the schemas in the . ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema In schemaSet.Schemas() schema.Write(Console.Out) Next ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); foreach (XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas()) { schema.Write(Console.Out); } ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ICollection Schemas(string targetNamespace) cil managed
Public Function Schemas (targetNamespace As String) As ICollection

param.name: targetNamespace
param.span: 結構描述 targetNamespace 屬性。

span.span: The schema targetNamespace property.

summary.span: 傳回 中屬於指定命名空間之所有 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the that belong to the given namespace.

returns.span: 物件，包含已加入至 之屬於指定命名空間的所有結構描述。

span.span: An object containing all the schemas that have been added to the that belong to the given namespace.

returns.span: 如果結構描述尚未加入至 ，則會傳回空的 物件。

span.span: If no schemas have been added to the , an empty object is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`targetNamespace`參數是`null`或，則會傳回沒有命名空間的所有結構描述。If the `targetNamespace` parameter is `null` or , then all schemas without a namespace are returned. 這個方法會傳回結構描述，已加入間接因為它們已匯入。This method returns schemas that were added indirectly to the because they were imported. > [!NOTE] > 方法相當於方法過時。The method is the equivalent of the method of the obsolete . ## Examples 下列範例說明如何反覆查看中的所有結構描述http://www.contoso.com/books命名空間中的。The following example illustrates how to iterate over all the schemas in the http://www.contoso.com/books namespace in the . ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema In schemaSet.Schemas("http://www.contoso.com/books") schema.Write(Console.Out) Next ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); foreach (XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas("http://www.contoso.com/books")) { schema.Write(Console.Out); } ```

summary.span: 指定事件處理常式，接收 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述驗證錯誤的資訊。

span.span: Specifies an event handler for receiving information about XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema validation errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定事件處理常式，接收有關結構描述驗證錯誤的資訊時或方法稱為。Sets an event handler for receiving information about schema validation errors when the or methods of the are called. 如果未定義的事件處理常式，任何驗證錯誤時擲回其中是。If an event handler is not defined, an is thrown on any validation errors where the is . 驗證錯誤，不擲回例外狀況的。Exceptions are not thrown for validation errors with an of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將說明加入來驗證 XML 文件結構描述時，擷取錯誤和警告。The following code example illustrates adding a to capture errors and warnings when validating an XML document against a schema. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/CPP/xmlschemasetexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/CS/xmlschemasetexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/VB/xmlschemasetexample.vb#1)] 此範例會使用將 books.xml 檔案做為輸入。The example uses the books.xml file as an input. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/XML/books.xml#2)] 此範例會使用 books.xsd 檔案做為輸入。The example uses the books.xsd file as an input. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/XML/books.xsd#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ XmlResolver { void set(System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ value); };

summary.span: 設定 ，用於解析在結構描述之 Include 和 Import 項目中參考的命名空間或位置。

span.span: Sets the used to resolve namespaces or locations referenced in include and import elements of a schema.

value.span: ，用於解析在結構描述之 Include 和 Import 項目中參考的命名空間或位置。

span.span: The used to resolve namespaces or locations referenced in include and import elements of a schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的用來解析命名空間或參考中的位置包含和匯入的結構描述、 項目結構描述會加入使用任何時間或方法。The of an is used to resolve namespaces or locations referenced in include and import elements of a schema, any time a schema is added using the or methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 外部命名空間或參考中的位置包含，匯入和重新定義結構描述的項目會解析與基底 URI 包含或匯入它們之結構描述。External namespaces or locations referenced in include, import, and redefine elements of a schema are resolved with respect to the base URI of the schema that includes or imports them. 例如，如果包含或匯入結構描述的基底 URI 是空的或`null`，外部位置都相對於目前目錄中已解決。For example, if the base URI of the including or importing schema is empty or `null`, the external locations are resolved with respect to the current directory. 類別預設用來解析外部結構描述。The class is used to resolve external schemas by default. 若要停用的 include，匯入、 解析度和重新定義結構描述的元素，設定屬性`null`。To disable resolution of include, import, and redefine elements of a schema, set the property to `null`.
